publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3535 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Substitution on Committees—That the Parliament agrees that— Shirley-Anne Somerville be appointed to replace Willie Coffey as the Scottish National Party substitute on the Equal Opportunities Committee; Kenneth Gibson be appointed to replace Roseanna Cunningham as the Scottish National Party substitute on the Finance Committee; Linda Fabiani be appointed to replace Sandra White as the Scottish National Party substitute on the Public Audit Committee.
